response.overview: Two carefree pals from Brooklyn traveling through rural Alabama on their way back to college are mistakenly arrested, and charged with murder. Fortunately, one of them has a cousin who's a lawyer - Vincent Gambini, a former auto mechanic from Brooklyn who just passed his bar exam after his sixth try. When he arrives with his leather-clad girlfriend, to try his first case, it's a real shock - for him and the Deep South!
response.tagline: There have been many courtroom dramas that have glorified the Great American Legal System. This is not one of them.
response.title: My Cousin Vinny

results.name: Marisa Tomei Wins Supporting Actress | 65th Oscars (1993)
